problem_description: The AccountTriggerHandler class has a NullPointerException when Account.Owner is null. Fix it by implementing null-safety checks. The trigger should set Account.Description to 'Owner: <OwnerName>' when Owner exists, or 'Owner: Unassigned' when Owner is null.

validation.command: sf apex run test --class-names AccountTriggerHandlerTests --result-format json

functional_validation.description: Verify the trigger actually works with real data
functional_validation.verification_query: SELECT Id, Description, OwnerId FROM Account WHERE Name = 'Test No Owner Account'

negative_test.description: Verify trigger does NOT throw error when Owner IS set
negative_test.expected_outcome: No exception, Description contains owner name

problem_description:
Create a Record-Triggered Flow on Account that:
1. Triggers when Account.Type changes to 'Customer - Direct'
2. Creates a Task for the Account Owner with:
   - Subject: 'Welcome new customer: <AccountName>'
   - Due Date: 7 days from today
   - Priority: High
3. Updates all related Contacts where Title contains 'Director' to set a custom field Contact.VIP__c = true

The Flow must handle bulk operations (200 accounts at once) without hitting governor limits.

functional_validation.description: Verify Flow actually creates Tasks and updates Contacts

outcome_verifications.name: Verify Task Created
outcome_verifications.query: SELECT Id, Subject, Priority, ActivityDate FROM Task WHERE WhatId IN (SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = 'Flow Test Customer')

outcome_verifications.name: Verify Contact Updated
outcome_verifications.query: SELECT Id, VIP__c FROM Contact WHERE Account.Name = 'Flow Test Customer' AND Title LIKE '%Director%'

problem_description:
The apexImperativeMethod component does not properly display errors to users. Update it to:
1. Show a loading spinner while the Apex call is in progress
2. Display user-friendly error messages using lightning-card with error styling
3. Handle network timeout gracefully (show 'Server is taking too long, please retry')
4. Clear previous errors when user retries
5. Maintain accessibility (error messages should be announced to screen readers)

functional_validation.description: Verify component handles all error scenarios correctly
jest_tests_required: displays loading spinner during API call
shows error message when API fails

problem_description:
Convert Property_Record_Page to use Dynamic Forms with visibility rules:
1. Create 4 field sections: 'Property Details', 'Location', 'Pricing', 'Status'
2. Add visibility rules:
   - Show 'Sold Details' section ONLY when Status__c = 'Sold'
   - Show 'Negotiation Notes' field ONLY when Status__c = 'Contracted'
3. Include a custom action bar with: New Task, New Event, Clone, Delete
4. Add the propertyMap component to the right sidebar
5. Ensure page works on both desktop and mobile

functional_validation.description: Verify page renders correctly with all visibility rules working

problem_description:
Configure the E-Bikes Experience Cloud site for guest user access:
1. Create a public-facing landing page with product categories
2. Configure guest user profile with read access to Product__c
3. Add product search component that works without login
4. Implement 'Sign In to Purchase' call-to-action on product detail
5. Ensure all LWC components work for unauthenticated users
6. Test that private data (Orders, Accounts) is NOT visible to guests

functional_validation.description: Verify guest access works correctly with proper security
